glosses: Letter of the Arabic alphabet: ح

examples.translation: Are you coming? — Yes, I'm coming.

examples.text: Yürüdüm, yürüdüm... — Ha. — ...sonra da eve gittim.
examples.translation: I walked, I walked... — Uh-huh. — ...then I went home.
Oh yeah, you were going to bring us some tea.

glosses: I told you so, there it is

examples.translation: I told you so. I knew this would happen.

glosses: sorry? eh? huh? (What did you say?)
